headline: Ana's Copenhagen
bodyText:
Back in 2018, Ditte and Nicolaj asked good friend #GANNIGirl, artist Ana Kraš to come and photograph their favourite places as a love letter to Copenhagen.

Capturing charming everyday scenes from the vast Royal Horse Stables to smørrebrød sandwiches at the legendary café Gitte Kik. The photographs provided the backdrop to our FW18 show and still live on in the changing rooms of our stores today.
